main.main_text: Create a resume that will get you a job
main.subtitle: Get it done in minutes with our resume builder and cover letter maker. Get 70% more interviews. More than 5 million users have already found a decent job with us.
main.advantages__text2: Finish in the top 3% that make it through the first round.
main.advantages__text4: Enjoy an effective cover letter guide and inspiring examples.
main.advantages__text6: Enjoy an effective cover letter guide and inspiring examples.
main.advantages__text8: Expert advice and examples from the life of successful applicants.

contact.Ltstext: Tell us who you are, how employers can contact you and what your profession is.
contact.name: Name

education-tips.tips_item1: List your degrees in order of the highest degree you received.
education-tips.tips_item2: If you are still in school, please provide an estimated graduation date.
education-tips.tips_item3: It is optional to include any honors, awards, scholarships or professional certifications.

education.Ltsbz: Where did you go to school?
education.name: School name

experience-tips.tips_item1: Work experience is usually the most important section on your entire resume.
experience-tips.tips_item2: This is where recruiters will look for proof that you have what it takes to get the job done.
experience-tips.tips_item3: It is optional to include any honors, awards, scholarships or professional certifications.
experience-tips.tips_item4: Let's collect information about your achievements in past jobs to complete this section.

experience.Ltsbz: Start with your most recent work experience.
experience.Ltstext: Let us know who you are, how employers can contact you, and what your profession is.
experience.name: Title of the work

skill-tips.tips_item1: Этот раздел объединяет разделы об опыте работы и образовании.
skill-tips.tips_item2: Это ваш шанс продемонстрировать потенциальным работодателям навыки, которые вы приобрели в ходе своей карьеры и образования.

skills.Ltsbz: Навыки, которые вы добавляете, должны отражать требования работы, на которую вы претендуете.
skills.Ltstext: Сообщите нам, кто вы, как работодатели могут связаться с вами и какая у вас профессия.
skills.name: Навыки
